description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) related API endpoints, including listing roles and permissions. It imports middleware for authentication and permission checks, and interacts with a database module to retrieve data.

methods.name: router.get('/roles')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of roles from the database, with authentication and permission checks.

methods.name: router.get('/permissions')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a list of permissions from the database, with authentication and permission checks.

calls: getDb().query('SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY name')
getDb().query('SELECT * FROM permissions ORDER BY name')
